pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:0.5: 42. The training rule on using high couches
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.2: the nuns were using high and luxurious couches.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.3: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.4: “How can nuns use high and luxurious couches? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.6: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:1.14.1: ‘If a nun uses a high or luxurious couch, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.6: one that is oversize is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.8: one decorated with images of predatory animals.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1.10: if she sits down or lies down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.2: if she uses a high couch after cutting off the legs;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.3: if she uses a luxurious couch after removing the decorations with images of predatory animals;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.2.6: The second training rule is finished.
